block.p: $552,000 344 West 23rd Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. condo in 17-year-old building; part-time doormen, hardwood floors, 2 exposures, balcony, washer/dryer in unit; common charge $672, taxes $6,900; listed at $559,000, 12 weeks on market (brokers: Sotheby's International; Silverman Group)

$552,000 344 West 23rd Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. condo in 17-year-old building; part-time doormen, hardwood floors, 2 exposures, balcony, washer/dryer in unit; common charge $672, taxes $6,900; listed at $559,000, 12 weeks on market (brokers: Sotheby's International; Silverman Group)

$2.9 million 114 Liberty Street 5-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 5,300-sq.-ft. condo in loft building; part-time doormen, dining area, library, fireplace, upgraded kitchen and baths, 4 exposures; common charge $1,347, 100% tax-abated; listed at $4.25 million, 8 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

$675,000 139 West 82nd Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath 1,350-sq.-ft. prewar co-op; part-time doormen, windowed eat-in kitchen, washer/dryer in unit, laundry room and storage in basement; maintenance $1,550, 45% tax-deductible; listed at $649,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (broker: Halstead Property Co.)

$450,000 782 West End Avenue (98th St.) 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,050-sq.-ft. co-op in prewar building; live-in superintendent, ash-and-mahogany parquet floors, original moldings and detail, 3 exposures; maintenance $698, 41% tax-deductible; listed at $450,000, 2 weeks on market (broker: Wohlfarth & Associates)

$860,000 91 Central Park West (69th St.) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,300-sq.-ft. co-op in prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; large foyer, windowed kitchen, 10-ft. beamed ceilings, hardwood floors, 2 exposures, washer/ dryer in unit; maintenance $1,319, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $875,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

$450,000 5643 Mosholu Avenue 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 1930's house with cottage; sunroom, high ceilings, full basement in house; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, eat-in kitchen in cottage; 100.6-by-123-ft. lot, taxes $2,620; listed at $475,000, 26 weeks on market (broker: John Edwards Real Estate)

$499,500 257 Westminster Road 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath wood-frame house, circa 1900, with 1-car garage; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room with cathedral ceilings, central air-conditioning; taxes $2,500; listed at $499,500, 1 week on market (broker: Aguayo & Huebener)

$645,000 479 11th Street 3-family, 3-story brick house, circa 1900; 2 bedrooms in two units; 1 bedroom in other; pine-plank floors, marble mantels, 1 bath in each; rear patio; 22-by-59-ft. lot, taxes $1,900; listed at $650,000, 1 week on market (broker: Orrichio & Anderson)

$521,500 53 Montgomery Place 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,400-sq.-ft. duplex co-op in brownstone; dining room, tin ceilings, hardwood floors, decorative mantels, original moldings and detail, private garden; maintenance $740, 51% tax-deductible; listed at $525,000, 13 weeks on market (broker: Susan N. Breen)

$410,000 30 Brookside Court 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 11-year-old town house with 1-car garage; entry hall, dining room, fireplace, whirlpool bath off master suite, rear deck; 50-by-50-ft. lot, taxes $6,840; listed at $395,000 (multiple bids), 3 weeks on market (brokers: Coldwell Banker/ Country Properties; Julia B. Fee)

$4.25 million 1091 Ocean Avenue 3-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, newly constructed and furnished house with 3-car garage; dining room, family room, library, 3 fireplaces, rear deck; 70-by-425-ft. lot includes oceanfront, taxes $15,604; listed at $4.7 million, 13 weeks on market (Broker: Donnelly Real Estate)

$419,900 16 Jean Avenue 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 42-year-old vinyl-sided house with 2-car garage; remodeled eat-in kitchen, family room, 2 fireplaces, new furnace; 0.38-acre lot, taxes $4,008; listed at $419,900, 8 weeks on market (brokers: Coldwell Banker/Norwalk and Westport)
